mapper.insert: insert into sportapp.files (user_id, address, plate, targetId) VALUES (#{user_id},#{address},#{plate},#{targetid})
mapper.delete: delete from sportapp.files where user_id=#{user_id} and targetId=#{targetid}
mapper.select: select * from sportapp.files where user_id=#{user_id} and targetId=#{targetid}
